newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal's Papelaria Fernandes stock trades again.
newsitem.headline: Portugal's Papelaria Fernandes stock trades again.

text.p: Portugal's Financial Markets Committee lifted on Monday a suspension on trade in office materials firm Papelaria Fernandes Mobiliarios, traders said.
The shares were suspended on September 27 apparently after press reports that paper group Inapa was ready to sell its stake in the group.
Inapa denied any such intention on Friday.
